title: Make langid.fl support dynamic fields
description:
Today, an attempt to set dynamic fields in langid.fl property is ignored.

Setting <langid.fl>*_data,text</langid.fl> doesn't run the component on *_data fields but runs it on text field.

Many of solr schemas today use dynamic fields.

comments.author: Jack Krupansky
comments.content:
I suspect that you mean support for glob wildcard patterns for field names.

Dynamic fields should already work fine - I used them in examples in my book.

comments.author: adfel
comments.content:
Can you make lang-id component work on dynamic fields, without specifying the specific field?

If so, I would much appreciate an example.
Thanks.
